Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Cauldron = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local vPlayer
local smoke
Tool.Enabled = true
local humanoids = {} local cauldronClone
local dropSound
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end Tool.Enabled = false vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myTorso == nil then return end humanoids = {} vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) smoke = Instance.new("Smoke") smoke.Color = Color3.new(0, 1, 0) smoke.Opacity = 0.2 smoke.RiseVelocity = 0.0 smoke.Size = 0.1 smoke.Parent = Cauldron wait(1.5)
dropSound = Cauldron:FindFirstChild("DropSound") if dropSound then dropSound:Play() end
cauldronClone = Cauldron:Clone() cauldronClone.CanCollide = true cauldronClone.CFrame = Cauldron.CFrame cauldronClone.Parent = game.Workspace
Cauldron.Transparency = 1.0
players = game.Players:GetChildren() for i = 1, #players do if players[i] ~= vPlayer then tempChar = players[i].Character if tempChar then tempHumanoid = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") tempTorso = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Torso") if tempHumanoid and tempTorso then distance = (tempTorso.Position - myTorso.Position).magnitude if distance < 30.0 then if tempChar:FindFirstChild("ConfusionScript") == nil then smokeClone = smoke:Clone() smokeClone.Parent = tempTorso newScript = Tool.ConfusionScript:Clone() newScript.Parent = tempChar newScript.Disabled = false end end end end end end smoke.Size = 30 wait(1.0) if smoke then smoke:Remove() end wait(1.0) if cauldronClone then cauldronClone:Remove() end Cauldron.Transparency = 0.0 wait(6.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() Cauldron.Transparency = 0.0 if dropSound then dropSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

vCharacter = script.Parent
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso")
local duration = 6 if vCharacter ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and myTorso ~= nil then smoke = myTorso:FindFirstChild("Smoke") myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = -16 while duration > 0 do duration = duration - 1 myHumanoid:TakeDamage(5) wait(1.0) end if smoke then smoke:Remove() end myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end
wait(2) script:Remove()
